name: Deploy
description:
[Offensive]
 Deploy a bipod or use a gadget.

Certain gadgets may end your turn immediately, such as Controlling Drones, Pinging, or Hacking.

name: Reload
description:
[Support]
 Reload your selected weapon, restoring your round count to full.

, when reloading with ammunition in the mag, you can shoot again in the same turn. However- it will apply a -1 malus to your shot. 

 Reloading from empty applies a -1 to all actions that turn.

name: Patch up
description:
[Support] [Medical]
 Patch yourself up and remove wounds.

Patching yourself up requires having 1 FAK for a flesh wound, and 2 FAKs or an AFAK for deep wounds. When consumed, these items are removed from your inventory.

You remove 1 + [Medical skill roll] worth of wounds when consumed. 

 Alternatively, painkillers do exist, and can be used by rolling your medical skill to nullify wounds for 1+[medical roll] turns.

name: Repair
description:
[Support] [Repair Tool]
 Repair vehicles, equipment, and drones 

 When repairing, roll with tinker to determine the amount of wounds of damage repaired. Prioritizes Critical Damage first, and then fixes minor damage. vehicle crews 'relax' when their vehicles are being repaired.

 For drones, multiply the roll by 2 for how much damage repaired.
